function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of cognitive computing and AI for COVID-19 diagnosis","Impact":"Wrong diagnosis leading to improper treatment","Mitigation":"Quality assurance and validation checks for AI algorithms","Technologies":"Quality control algorithms, validation frameworks","People":"COVID-19 patients, healthcare providers","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, AI developers"},{"Description":"Data mining and analytics for COVID-19 research","Impact":"Misinterpretation of scientific literature leading to flawed research","Mitigation":"Peer review and validation of data mining results","Technologies":"Peer review platforms, validation frameworks","People":"Researchers, scientific community","Owner":"Research institutions, data mining organizations"},{"Description":"Graph analytics for identifying relationships in scientific publications","Impact":"Misinterpretation of relationships leading to incorrect conclusions","Mitigation":"Cross-validation of relationships with other sources","Technologies":"Cross-validation algorithms, data integration platforms","People":"Researchers, scientific community","Owner":"Research institutions, graph analytics developers"}]}
